entry.title: @dynamic使用小结
entry.content:
@dynamic的作用

@dynamic与@synthesize对应，写在@implementation里。意思是告诉编译器Getter和Setter方法由由开发者实现。

使用场景

```objc @interface ClassA : NSObject

@end

@interface Father : NSObject

@property (nonatomic, strong) ClassA *obj;

@end

@interface ClassB : ClassA

@end

@interface Son : Father

@property (nonatomic, strong) ClassB *obj;

@end

@implementation Son

// 变量obj的getter和setter方法，由父类Father实现 @dynamic obj;

@end ```

或

```objc @interface ClassA : NSObject

@end

@interface Father : NSObject

@property (nonatomic, strong) ClassA *obj;

@end

@interface ClassB : ClassA

@end

@interface Son : Father

@property (nonatomic, strong) ClassB *obj;

@end

@implementation Father

// 变量obj的getter和setter方法，必须由子类实现，否则会在运行时抛出异常（unrecognized selector） @dynamic obj;

@end ```
